questions.vignette: A man walks into a bar and orders a drink. The bartender pulls out a gun and points it at him. The man says 'Thank you' and walks out. Why did he say thank you?
choices: The man was thanking the bartender for his service
The man was thanking the bartender for not shooting him
The man was thanking the bartender for giving him a drink
questions.explanation: The man had hiccups, and the shock of the gun made them go away.
